mapper.select: SELECT A.CONFIGURATION_UUID configurationUUID , A.CONFIGURATION_CODE configurationCode , A.CONFIGURATION_VALUE configurationValue , A.SERVICE_UUID serviceUUID , B.SERVICE_NAME serviceName , A.INSERT_UUID insertUUID , A.DESCRIPTION description , A.NOTES notes , DECODE(A.USE_YN,'Y''true','N','false') useYN , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM AC_USER "USER" WHERE A.INSERT_UUID = "USER".USER_UUID ) insertUserName , TO_CHAR(A.INSERT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') insertDate , A.UPDATE_UUID updateUUID , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM AC_USER "USER" WHERE A.UPDATE_UUID = "USER".USER_UUID ) updateUserName , TO_CHAR(A.UPDATE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') updateDate FROM AD_CONFIGURATION A , AD_SERVICE B WHERE A.SERVICE_UUID = B.SERVICE_UUID
